name: Echos of Cithaeron
description:
A JRPG that starts where others end, taking an unexpected turn.

Hiro is a soldier of the Copper Kingdom who had been assigned as an escort to Princess Prydwen, but the evil Duke of Prosperity takes the castle by force and kidnaps the princess to sacrifice her to the bowels of Mount Sapo, where the Forces of Evil reside.

Accompanied by the friends he has made along the way and following the prophecy of the sage Zorlek, Hiro enters Mount Toad ready to face the Duke in the final battle....

First project done with RPG Maker VX Ace. Requires RTP to work http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages

Controls: Activate (Z/Enter), Menu/Back (X), Exit (Esc).

Enjoy!
